titles.title: Am I A Soldier of the Cross?

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Am I a soldier of the cross? A foll'wer of the Lamb, And shall I fear to own His cause, Or blush to speak His name?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Must I be carried to the skies On flow'ry beds of ease, While others fought to win the prize, And sailed thro' bloody seas?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Are there no foes for me to face? Must I not stem the flood? Is this vile world a friend to grace, To help me on to God?

verse.name: v4
